5602.quoteText: The Services use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs, JavaScript, and local storage.
5602.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: The Brilliant Cookie Policy states, "The Services use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs, JavaScript, and local storage."

5603.quoteText: These are Cookies placed by a third party on your device and may provide information to those third parties about browsing habits (including your visits to our Services, the pages you have visited and the links and advertisements you have clicked) that may help identify if certain services that such third parties provide are being used, identify your interests, retarget you and serve advertisements that are relevant to you.
5603.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.
tosdr.tldr: As stated in Brilliant's Cookie Policy, a cookie type that they use are Third Party Cookies, which are "placed by a third party on your device and may provide information to those third parties about browsing habits (including your visits to our Services, the pages you have visited and the links and advertisements you have clicked) that may help identify if certain services that such third parties provide are being used, identify your interests, retarget you and serve advertisements that are relevant to you."

5604.quoteText:
Brilliant reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any of the terms or conditions of this Agreement at any time.
It is User's responsibility to check this Agreement periodically for changes.
5604.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: "Brilliant reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any of the terms or conditions of this Agreement at any time. It is User's responsibility to check this Agreement periodically for changes."

5605.quoteText: Our Services do not support Do Not Track requests at this time, which means that we collect information about your online activity both while you are using the Services and after you leave the Services
5605.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

5606.quoteText:
Through cookies we place on your browser or device, we may collect information about your online activity after you leave our Services.
Just like any other usage information we collect, this information allows us to improve the Services and customize your online experience, and otherwise as described in this Privacy Policy.
5606.title: This service tracks you on other websites

Just like any other usage information we collect, this information allows us to improve the Services and customize your online experience, and otherwise as described in this Privacy Policy."

5609.quoteText: Brilliant reserves the right to, in its sole discretion, remove any User Submission(s) at any time (with or without notice).
